title: Montana Breweries
shortDesc: Leaflet map of breweriers and population in Montana.
desc: Used Leaflet.js, HTML and CSS to map breweries in Montana and county populations. Based off a NICAR 2016 presentation by Chris Essig.

title: The Meth Effect
shortDesc: Co-built and designed the website for The Montana Meth Effect, a University of Montana Journalism School project uncovering the effects of methamphetamine in Montana.
desc: Co-built and designed the website for The Montana Meth Effect, a University of Montana Journalism School project uncovering the effects of methamphetamine in Montana.
pub: University of Montana School of Journalism

title: Protect public lands petition
desc: A full stack application that allows users to register and login, sign a canvas petition and edit their profile. Built during SPICED Academy, an immersive JavaScript-based web development course.

title: Missoula to Berlin website
desc: Designed the website for Missoula to Berlin, a University of Montana Journalism School project reporting on the refugee crisis in Berlin.

title: Infographics: Missoula to Berlin
desc: Reported and designed infographics for Burying the Dead, a story examining death and the refugee crisis. Data from the Migrant Files

title: Web design: Center for Children, Families and Workforce Development

tech: Cascade CMS, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, HTML/CSS
